summary: Fixed parse error in _header.blade.php by removing Persian/Farsi comments from @php blocks. The Persian text in PHP comments was causing encoding issues that broke Blade template compilation, resulting in 'unexpected token endforeach' error. Removed all Persian comments from the @php blocks (lines 235-236, 243-244, 248-249) while keeping the English comments and functionality intact. Cleared view and config cache. Server is now responding correctly.
current_status: Parse error fixed. Persian comments removed from @php blocks to prevent encoding issues. View and config cache cleared. Server responding correctly on port 8000. Admin panel should now load without parse errors.
